entry.title: Tour of my Home Lab | Old Lab

media:group.media:title: Tour of my Home Lab | Old Lab
media:group.media:description:
A short Lab tour video I made back in 2015. My lab back then was in a modest, rundown damp shed in our house. Even though I’d already uploaded this video on youtube around that same time, I had to take it down some years ago due to copyright issues (I used a copyrighted music as background). Over the years since I made this video, my lab has evolved so much more, with new concrete housing, and new equipments and general labware acquired along the way. I plan on making a proper lab tour video as well, of my current lab, as it stands today. But for now, I hope you’ll enjoy this small tour of my cherished space as much as I do. And Please don’t mind the horrible video quality; video recording was from a android jellybean-era phone.
#ThomasTKtungnung #UniqueHobbies

entry.title: Chemistry Set Review | BOROSIL MINILAB Review

media:group.media:title: Chemistry Set Review | BOROSIL MINILAB Review
media:group.media:description:
This is a quick walkthrough video of the BOROSIL MINILAB, a compact Chemistry set designed by Borosil, India's leading name in the glassware industry. Up until the making of this video, the Minilab has not been out in market yet. However, according to the Loveforscience website (link given below) you can request a free sample by filling up some details on that same website.
For more details on the minilab: Visit: https://loveforscience.in/ https://www.facebook.com/Love-For-Sci... https://twitter.com/loveforscience_ https://www.instagram.com/loveforscience_/?hl=en Contact: mansi.shelke@borosil.com
#ThomasTKtungnung #LabStuffsUnboxingReview #Borosil

A Unboxing Video of Borosil's Soon to be released Chemistry Set: The BOROSIL MINILAB (Love for Science).
For more Details on this amazing Chemistry Set: Visit: https://loveforscience.in/ https://www.facebook.com/Love-For-Science-109214573759312/ Contact: mansi.shelke@borosil.com

entry.title: Tour Of Biotech Lab | Biotechnology Department Manipur University

media:group.media:title: Tour Of Biotech Lab | Biotechnology Department Manipur University
media:group.media:description: A short virtual tour of the Biotechnology department at Manipur University where i'm currently doing my PhD in Plant biotechnology and Molecular biology. Granted its a modest lab with modest amenities, and not even among the best by any standards, but this barely 10 year old department at Manipur university has been making breakthrough researches in fields of cancer research, virology, plant and animal biotechnology and microbiology. Proud to be a research scholar here at my beloved home state's only central university! Hope u like this short video tour!

entry.title: Wet Specimen Tutorial | Preserving a Placenta

media:group.media:title: Wet Specimen Tutorial | Preserving a Placenta
media:group.media:description: I recently made a formalin wet specimen out of my baby Lucas' placenta. This is a video tutorial on how i went about preserving his placenta.

media:group.media:description: Everything you need to know about the What, How and Why of RAT test for SARS CoV 2 virus. Watch till the end. For procedure only, click the video link below:

media:group.media:title: Covid19 RAT Test Procedure complete
media:group.media:description: This video shows complete practical procedure of Rapid Antigen Test for SARS CoV-2 virus. entry.title: Any Change in Blood Cell Shape Pre and Post Covid Vaccination & Infection??

media:group.media:title: Any Change in Blood Cell Shape Pre and Post Covid Vaccination & Infection??
media:group.media:description: This simple investigation shows how blood cells appear before and after Covid-19 vaccination, and also before and after Covid-19 infection. This is a rudimentary investigation, do let me know your thoughts in the comments below. Especially comments from expert Lab technicians/Hematologists highly welcome.
